attributes.name: Blightroot Stem
attributes.description: Its alchemical properties are especially useful in potion crafting.
attributes.parsed_description: Its alchemical properties are especially useful in potion crafting.

attributes.name: Blight Seeds
attributes.description: A blight seed that can be found on boss creatures in the Garden of Genesis expedition.
attributes.parsed_description: A blight seed that can be found on boss creatures in the Garden of Genesis expedition.

attributes.name: Blight Tincture Bomb
attributes.description: A powerful explosive, packed with bottles of Blight Resistance tincture.
attributes.parsed_description: A powerful explosive, packed with bottles of Blight Resistance tincture.

attributes.name: Blistering Reagents
attributes.description: A collection of blisteringly hot flammable powders.
attributes.parsed_description: A collection of blisteringly hot flammable powders.

attributes.name: Blisterweave
attributes.description: This cloth seems to have the very essence of fire woven into it.
attributes.parsed_description: This cloth seems to have the very essence of fire woven into it.

attributes.name: Blood-soaked Ore
attributes.description: A chunk of ore that has been soaked with blood. This will certainly pique Commander Purcell's interest.
attributes.parsed_description: A chunk of ore that has been soaked with blood. This will certainly pique Commander Purcell's interest.

attributes.name: Bloodspore Bloom
attributes.description: The flesh of a Bloodspore mushroom.
attributes.parsed_description: The flesh of a Bloodspore mushroom.

attributes.name: Bloody Heart
attributes.description: A large ruby known as a Bloody Heart. It throbs and pulses rhythmically.
attributes.parsed_description: A large ruby known as a Bloody Heart. It throbs and pulses rhythmically.

attributes.name: Blossoming Flower
attributes.description: A rare purple blossom that is full of new life.
attributes.parsed_description: A rare purple blossom that is full of new life.

attributes.name: Blue-blooded Barb
attributes.description: A very rare, legendary creature of the sea. Can be used to decorate your home, giving a large boost to your peacocking score.
attributes.parsed_description: A very rare, legendary creature of the sea. Can be used to decorate your home, giving a large boost to your peacocking score.

attributes.name: Blue Pigment
attributes.description: Used in dye crafting to create dyes in shades of blue.
attributes.parsed_description: Used in dye crafting to create dyes in shades of blue.

attributes.name: Blue-Winged Serpe
attributes.description: A very rare, legendary creature of the sea. Can be used in combination with other legendary fish to create the ultimate fishing trophy.
attributes.parsed_description: A very rare, legendary creature of the sea. Can be used in combination with other legendary fish to create the ultimate fishing trophy.
